name: Netflix - Rounded with More Content
description:
Netflix - Rounded with More Content
by Stylish v1.0
additional_info: Netflix /nɛtflɪks/, is an American entertainment company founded by Reed Hastings and Marc Randolph on August 29, 1997, in Scotts Valley, California.[8] It specializes in and provides streaming media and video-on-demand online and DVD by mail. In 2013, Netflix expanded into film and television production as well as online distribution. It is headquartered in Los Gatos, California.
